title: Ranger Danger
description: You're mine now His raw words bring me to my kneesMaking me beg for the freedom I craveHe found me alone in the woodsBrought me to his self-imposed prison to wait out the storm, locking us together in a forbidden embrace To play with To own To mark as hisReleasing me from my dirty cageHe wants everythingAll my firsts, staking claims for any man who dares to question himHis past still haunts his dreams, and I’m just the girl to release his demonsCan this Alpha, this lone older wolf, turn out to be my salvation?The one to get my dark, twisted thoughts?Yes, he takes what he wants, but will he ask me to stay once he finds out the reason why I’m here? This Ranger is Danger personified The only question is: Will he fight for me, or let me go when the storm ends?
author: L.A. Wayward
